spiritual-guidance.name: üôè Vimarsh Spiritual Guidance Dashboard
spiritual-guidance.description: Comprehensive monitoring for spiritual guidance system

widgets.title: Daily Seekers Served
widgets.query: customEvents | where name == 'SpiritualGuidanceRequested' | summarize count() by bin(timestamp, 1d)

widgets.title: Quality Metrics
widgets.query: customEvents | where name == 'SpiritualGuidanceRequested' | extend quality = toreal(customDimensions.qualityScore) | summarize avg(quality)

cost-optimization.name: üí∞ AI Cost Management Dashboard
cost-optimization.description: Cost monitoring and optimization for AI services

widgets.title: Cost Trends
widgets.query: customEvents | where name == 'CostThresholdReached' | summarize sum(toreal(customDimensions.currentCost)) by bin(timestamp, 1d)

widgets.title: Budget Utilization
widgets.query: customEvents | where name == 'CostThresholdReached' | extend threshold = toreal(customDimensions.threshold) | summarize max(threshold)
